site.title: URL Shortener Tool - Url3.cc
site.description: Effortlessly shorten your links for improved sharing efficiency. Customize your short URLs, track click data, and gain insights into your links' performance.

common.drag-upload: Drag and Drop or click to upload.

hero.description: Convert your lengthy URLs into short and simple links in just a single click. Get started now!

demo.warn: Public links will be automatically-deleted if no one accesses them within 30 days. Create a free account to keep your links forever.

label.link: Enter your long URL to get started
label.image: Select your Image to get started

features.analysis_description: Easily view the click count and visit sources of your short URLs to better understand your target audience.
features.devices_target_description: Smartly redirect to the most suitable page based on the visitor's mobile system for a better user experience.
features.custom_description: Create fun short URLs for your long web addresses as you wish, making sharing easier and more enjoyable!

questions.a1: url3. cc is a free URL shortening service that allows you to shorten your long URLs into short and simple links in a few seconds.
questions.q2: How do I use url3. cc?
questions.a2: Enter a long URL in the input box and click the Generate button to generate a short URL
questions.q3: How long is the validity period of the link?
questions.a3: The validity period of links created by non logged in users is 30 days. If someone visits the link within 30 days, the validity period of the link will be extended to 30 days
questions.a4: You can send me an email at service{'@'}url3.cc
